shape_1_per_frame6=

shape_1_per_frame8=

shape_1_per_frame14=g2=.5-.3*sin(p);

shapecode_3_border_b=0.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.000
shape_3_per_frame1=ma=ma+(above(bass,1)*3.1415*.01*bass);
shape_3_per_frame2=ma=ma-(above(treb,1)*3.1415*.01*treb);
shape_3_per_frame3=
shape_3_per_frame4=mx=mx+(.0002*cos(ma));
shape_3_per_frame5=my=my+(.0002*tan(ma));
shape_3_per_frame6=
shape_3_per_frame7=mx=if(above(mx,.9),(.9-mx),mx);
shape_3_per_frame8=my=if(above(my,.9),(.9-my),my);
shape_3_per_frame9=mx=if(below(mx,.1),(.9+mx),mx);
shape_3_per_frame10=my=if(below(my,.1),(.9+my),my);
shape_3_per_frame11=
shape_3_per_frame12=x=1-mx;
shape_3_per_frame13=y=1-my;
shape_3_per_frame14=
shape_3_per_frame15=ang=(sin(time*.35)+1)*3;
shape_3_per_frame16=//a=(above(bass+mid+treb,.8));
shape_3_per_frame17=pi23=4*asin(1)*.333333333;
shape_3_per_frame18=t1=bass+mid+treb;
per_frame_init_1=i=0;  
per_frame_init_2=loop(10000, gmegabuf(i)=0;
per_frame_init_3=i=i+1;);
per_frame_init_4=
per_frame_init_5=t=0;
per_frame_1=wave_a=0;     warp=0;   decay=.1;   
per_frame_2=q6=aspecty;   t=t+.05/fps;   q1=t;
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=i=0;     x=0;     y=0;     p=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=loop(2048,       sample=i/2048;
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=p = .9*p*(1+.1*sin(2*t*sample+t)) +  2*cos(-sample-t);
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=x=x+sin(p);      y=y+cos(p);
per_frame_11=
per_frame_12=gmegabuf(2*i)=x;      gmegabuf(2*i+1)=y;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=i=i+1;);
per_frame_15=
per_frame_16=monitor=t;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=q2=.1+.1*sqrt(t);  ///zoom
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`  // sample previous frame
warp_4=`  ret = tex2D( sampler_pw_main, uv ).xyz;
warp_5=`
warp_6=`float3 ret7=ret;
warp_7=`if(frame%3==0)ret.z=.71-ret7.x;
warp_8=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_9=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_10=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_11=`                      ).xyz*
warp_12=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_13=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_14=`                     );
warp_15=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y -= (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_16=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z -= (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_17=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x -= (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_18=`if(frame%5==0)ret.x=.71-ret7.y;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`  float n;
warp_21=`  float2 d = texsize.zw*1;
warp_22=`  n  = saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2( 1, 1)).x*999);
warp_23=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2( 1, 0)).x*999);
warp_24=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2( 1,-1)).x*999);
warp_25=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2( 0, 1)).x*999);
warp_26=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2( 0,-1)).x*999);
warp_27=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2(-1, 1)).x*999);
warp_28=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2(-1, 0)).x*999);
warp_29=`  n += saturate(tex2D(sampler_pw_main, uv+d*float2(-1,-1)).x*999);
warp_30=`  
warp_31=`float t = 0.4;
warp_32=`  if (n < 1.9)
warp_33=`    ret -= t;
warp_34=`  if (n > 3.1)
warp_35=`    ret -= t;
warp_36=`
warp_37=`
warp_38=`  if (ret.x < 0.1 && abs(n-3) < 0.5)
warp_39=`    ret += t;
warp_40=`if(frame%7==0)ret.y=.71-ret7.z;
warp_41=`
warp_42=`
warp_43=`
warp_44=`
warp_45=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    uv = 0.05 + 0.9*uv;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    // equivalent of a laplacian: [center*4 - each of the 4 neighbors*1]
comp_6=`    ret = 0;
comp_7=`    ret += tex2D(sampler_main, uv ).xyz*4;
comp_8=`    ret -= GetBlur1(uv)*4;
comp_9=`ret *= -1;
comp_10=`
comp_11=`    // little bit of noise:
comp_12=`    //ret *= 1 + 0.12*(tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, rand_frame.xy 
comp_13=`    //       + uv*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw).xxx*2-1);
comp_14=` 
comp_15=`    // palettize:
comp_16=`    ret = pow(ret, float3(0.5, 0.5, 0.7));
comp_17=`
comp_18=`    ret = (ret-0.1)*1.1;
comp_19=`   
comp_20=`    //ret.xyz *= 2; // a little bit of overbright
comp_21=`}

comp_23=`
